issue.message: The layout "activity_atm" in layout-large has no declaration in the base `layout` folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
The layout "activity_atm" in layout-small has no declaration in the base `layout` folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
The layout "activity_atm" in layout-xlarge has no declaration in the base `layout` folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
